projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_idListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.p:
svasti śrī śakāpptam 1000 4 100 10 cellā niṉṟa kilaka saṅvat
sarattu tulānāyaṟṟu kiṣṇapakṣattu putaṉvāramum peṟṟa makaranakṣat-tirattu
śrīman paṭṭukkaṭṭāri paśapayaṅkara matiyātamaṉṉar maṇamāṉa kāñcī-pura
varādhiśvara koneridevamahārāśā cīkāḻi koyil tānattāṟku taṅkaḷ
ḷ koyil cīrmai sarvamum mānnyam āka naṭakkumpaṭiyum kaṟpittu
iraṇṭāṟṟuppaṟṟu cīrmaikku kurukularāya iṭṭa muṟiyilum kūṭā
kūṭāmal muṟipiṟinta niṉṟayam ākaiyāle ammariyyātile paṭṭaṭaicāttāma kal
veṭṭivari paṟaiyāvari uḷḷiṭṭa vakaiyum sarvamānnyam āka naṭakkum paṭi-yum taṅkaḷ
taṅkaḷ koyil cirmaiyāṉa vaṭakāverinallūr kīḻnaṟkoṟṟaṅkuṭi tirunāvukkaraca
nallūr viṭunilam kīṟānallūr viṭunilam uḷḷiṭṭavakaiyile nāṟpattu iruveli ni
lam paṇṇaiyākappatintu naṭantu vantatu eṉṟa paṭiyāle anta ūrkaḷ muṉpu pole
le koyil paṇṭārattile kaṇṭukoḷḷum paṭiyum muṉṉe kaṟpittu inta nilattuk
ku aṭṭavaṇai puṟavarikku kaṇakkāl uṇṭānaṉāṉa kurukula irāyaṉ peril kutta
kaippaṭi mutalile celaviṭṭu sarvamum mānnyam āka naṭakkumpaṭi kaṟpitta aḷavukku im
mariyātayile inta vakaikku uṇṭīr āṉa poṉ koyil paṇṭārattile kaṇṭu ko
ṇṭu pūcai tiruppaṇi tāḻvaṟa naṭatti oṉṟukkum añcāmal irukkavum yāṟuvo-tara?
ḻai yovalacācantaicātivariyiṉ vari sarvamum mānnyamāka kalluveṭṭu vittu pūcai
tiruppaṇi tāḻvu aṟa naṭattavum . caṟuvamum māṉiniyamāka kalluveṭṭi nāṭ-ṭikkoṇṭu pū
cai tiruppaṇi naṭatti oṉṟukkum añcāmal irukkavum . dānapālanayo
rmmadhye dānāt śreyonupālanam||dānāt svargamavāpnoti pālanā-daccyutam padam|śubhama
stu iruṅkoḷapāṇṭināṭu vaṅkāramuṭaiyār puṣpavaṉapperumāḷ kurukularāyar perāle carvamā
nnyam āka nirupam varukaiyil avar paṇṇuvitta dharmmam ||
